fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 165.50 points or 0.85% to settle at 19,331.80. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 2.59% to 11.53. Tata Motors, Reliance Industries and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
